name: Hide and Seek (itch) (Avi Vajpeyi)
description:
This game jam I played around a bit with Unity's ML agents! 

Controls
  • arrow keys / wasd to move
  • If "Hider", try to avoid the "Seeker"'s line of sight for 10 seconds
  • If "Seeker", try to find the "Hider" within 10 seconds 

Warning: The AI for the "Hider" is pretty bad haha. Maybe nextime, its be easier to code the AI manually.
